original_text: And blessed be thy advice, and blessed be thou, which hast kept me this day from coming to shed blood, and from avenging myself with mine own hand.
korean_text: 또 네 지혜를 칭찬할지며 또 네게 복이 있을지로다 오늘 내가 피를 흘릴 것과 친히 복수하는 것을 네가 막았느니라

sentences.original_text: which hast kept me this day
and from avenging myself with mine own hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 손으로 복수하지 않도록 하셨습니다
